data.title: Auschwitz Survivor Imre Kertesz Wins Nobel Prize in Literature
data.meta_description: STOCKHOLM - Hungarian Imre Kertesz, Whose Novels Often Focused on His Time in a Nazi Concentration Camp, Won the Nobel Prize in Literature Thursday for Explorin
